name: terrants
description:
terrants

Luscious ant-based black and white generative drawing app.



terrants is a continuous generative graphic process
that accumulates the movements of two ant teams in a
spatial region, super imposing their paths and 
interactions on a landscape. 
double tap lower right corner to save images.
drag elements across the landscape.
terrants was built in 2007; it is code from an 
installation work from 2007 by André Sier, 
adapted as a special version for tablets and 
smartphones, without any parameters to fiddle. 
standalone graphic process.
Project documentation from 2007 here
https://s373.net/x/terrants


terrants for iOS built at s373.net/x studios 21 nov 2013.
terrants for Android built at s373.net/x studios 21 dec 2013.
Desktop versions for Linux & Windows & possibly Mac to be
deployed here at s373.itch.io


[[ terrants was available as a iOS & Android app 
and their stores ]]
[[[ app removed from stores by stores. 
we believe in code once, code for all ]]]
[[[  enjoy a free html version 
at https://s373.net/x/terrants-html5   ]]]


At s373.net/x we value your feedback. Do get in touch.
special glitch .apk version available, we will update
code to streamline app experience across all platforms.


terrants copyright © 2007,2013,2020 André Sier & s373.net/x
